root.name: Dead Mountaineer's Hotel
root.description: StoryPlaying as a vacationing police detective traveling through a snowy mountain range, you are caught in an avalanche and seek shelter at a remote inn - Dead Mountaineer's Hotel. Upon your arrival everything appears normal. You meet the other hotel guests, talk about the stormy weather, have a drink, and take in the beautiful scenery...
